summary:
Senior IT Executive with over 10 years of progressive leadership experience overseeing enterprise technology strategy, governance, and operations across regulated and multi-site environments. Proven expertise in aligning IT infrastructure, cybersecurity, and enterprise systems with institutional objectives in high-compliance sectors.

Experienced in driving digital enablement, strengthening data governance frameworks, managing mission-critical infrastructure, and delivering secure, scalable platforms that support operational excellence and decision-making. Recognized for building resilient IT environments, optimizing budgets, leading cross-functional collaboration, and advising executive leadership on technology risk and innovation. A highly dependable systems thinker with a consistent track record of aligning academic, clinical, and administrative IT objectives with state-of-the-art technological advancement and governance policies.
executiveScale: 10+ Years IT Leadership  ·  Enterprise Systems & ERP  ·  Regulatory Compliance  ·  Budget Oversight

technical: Microsoft Dynamics Business Central & ERP Oversight

achievements.text: Lead enterprise IT strategy, governance, and operational oversight across 15 business centers supporting over 1,000 users and multinational institutional clients.
Developed and executed an enterprise IT roadmap strictly aligned with organizational expansion, academic facility goals, and structural operational resilience objectives.
Established comprehensive IT governance structures including access control policies, data protection protocols, acceptable use requirements, and enterprise operational risk frameworks.
Regularly advise executive leadership and board stakeholders on ongoing cybersecurity posture, emerging technology risks, and infrastructure investment planning to secure operations.
Implemented highly structured, data-driven IT performance reporting to support executive leadership decision-making and ensure alignment with quarterly institutional objectives.
Complete oversight of enterprise platforms including the Microsoft 365 ecosystem, organizational collaboration systems, VoIP infrastructure, and core financial system integrations.
Managed the critical ongoing integration of secure access gateways, strict identity governance, and continuous endpoint protection systems across all distributed regional locations.
Spearheaded cloud-first migration and modernization initiatives utilizing Microsoft Azure, dramatically improving system scalability, data security, and operational continuity for distributed teams.

Directly supported enterprise financial operations using Microsoft Dynamics Business Central, ensuring continuous system reliability, rigorous user access governance, and strict data integrity controls.
Implemented foundational cybersecurity governance completely aligned with global ISO 27001 best practices and corresponding institutional audit requirements.
Designed, documented, and successfully piloted disaster recovery (DR) and business continuity planning (BCP) frameworks, ensuring 99.9% institutional system availability.
Conducted exhaustive quarterly IT risk assessments and implemented long-term mitigation controls that measurably reduced external network vulnerabilities by over 30%.
Substantially strengthened endpoint security, network perimeter defenses, and continuous log monitoring frameworks across all deployed institutional sites.

Fully managed multi-site IT operational and capital expense budgets tightly coupled with rigorous vendor contract negotiation, achieving 20% cost optimization without compromising critical service quality.
Negotiated demanding SLAs with external technology providers and OEMs, strictly ensuring compliance and continuous, measurable technical support service improvements.
Strategically forecasted capital and operational technology investment requirements accurately tracking alongside the institution's long-term scale and growth strategy.
Systematically built, trained, and continually mentored high-performing, cross-functional engineering and IT support teams deployed uniquely across multiple distributed centers.
Established clear ITIL 4 aligned KPI frameworks and SLA service standards, effectively reducing standard incident resolution operational time globally by over 40%.
Organically fostered a durable institutional culture of accountability, continuous operational improvement, and highly structured, user-oriented IT service delivery at scale.
Championed digital capability enhancements, successfully deploying secure virtual environments and robust collaboration solutions to guarantee remote connectivity and institutional resilience.
Authored, revised, and enforced over two dozen standard operating procedures (SOPs) pertaining to hardware lifecycle management, provisioning, and secure decommissioning.

Provided high-level regional IT leadership uniformly across 500+ complex infrastructure deployments while overseeing strict project compliance, vendor governance, and high-quality operational execution across overlapping multi-region projects.

Administrated and executed against competitive multi-million-shilling infrastructure deployment budgets, successfully mandating strict cost controls and financial transparency protocols to executive leadership.
Aggressively negotiated multi-tiered vendor supply contracts and complex service agreements with tier-1 global OEMs, specifically including Huawei, Nokia, Cisco, and Ericsson.

Meticulously standardized multi-site deployment operational compliance frameworks (encompassing ISO quality benchmarks and rigorous occupational safety standards), directly improving macro project governance predictability.

Proactively led, cross-trained, and supported diverse cross-functional technical delivery teams, firmly ensuring highly consistent physical infrastructure deployment and ongoing regional operational risk mitigation.

Executed thorough network topology redesigns for wide-area routing distributions, guaranteeing optimal bandwidth capacity thresholds were maintained despite substantial regional onboarding and expanding project scope.

Spearheaded the integration of centralized predictive monitoring analytics, effectively transitioning regional support operations from historically reactive troubleshooting cycles to proactive infrastructural health maintenance paradigms.

Directly resolved entrenched level-3 network routing issues and hardware fault scenarios internally escalated from regional supervisors, mitigating cascading regional downtime against challenging contractual SLAs.
Critically contributed to sprawling, enterprise-wide ISO 27001-aligned ISMS initiatives intended to protect and harden sensitive institutional operations across internal networks.

Dramatically strengthened centralized digital records governance frameworks, ensuring auditable, secure, and resilient continuity access across a sensitive repository containing upwards of 50,000+ specialized regulatory records.

Proactively supported intensive regulatory compliance audits and structured enterprise ICT data management processes, ensuring comprehensive alignment to strict governmental frameworks and security mandates.

Managed frontline access control administration and periodic systemic access recertification reviews across sensitive domain networks, tightly restricting unauthorized internal exposure per required framework principles.

Assisted with end-to-end IT service delivery execution tasks, swiftly troubleshooting administrative hardware environments, executing localized software updates, and managing core peripheral endpoint integrations.
Supported core infrastructure provisioning functions securely operating within highly restricted aviation governance and operational facility boundaries.
Maintained and thoroughly tested essential backup power and uninterrupted hardware continuity systems supporting mission-critical sector communication arrays.
Executed meticulous software and firmware upgrades across localized workstation environments specifically avoiding service degradation of live monitoring assets.
